properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}They say sometimes you win some Sometimes you lose some And right now, right now I’m losing bad I’ve stood on this stage night after night Reminding the broken it’ll be alright But right now, oh right now I just can’t{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s easy to sing When there’s nothing to bring me down But what will I say When I’m held to the flame Like I am right now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know You’re able and I know You can Save through the fire with Your mighty hand But even if You don’t My hope is You alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}They say it only takes a little faith To move a mountain Good thing A little faith is all I have right now But God, when You choose To leave mountains unmovable Give me the strength to be able to sing It is well with my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know You’re able and I know You can Save through the fire with Your mighty hand But even if You don’t My hope is You alone I know the sorrow, and I know the hurt Would all go away if You’d just say the word But even if You don’t My hope is You alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’ve been faithful, You’ve been good All of my days Jesus, I will cling to You Come what may ‘Cause I know You’re able I know You can{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know You’re able and I know You can Save through the fire with Your mighty hand But even if You don’t My hope is You alone I know the sorrow, and I know the hurt Would all go away if You’d just say the word But even if You don’t My hope is You alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is well with my soul It is well, it is well with my soul{/lang-eng}
